roles.description: Developed internal tools which assisted developers to deliver products and results faster and more effectively. Interfaced with large scale clients to ensure their cloud infrastructure was tailored perfectly to their requirements and could handle the anticipated traffic. Utilised AWS CDK to develop reusable modules and BitBucket CI/CD to enforce company-wide coding standards.

title: Full Stack Developer · Graduate at Chamonix IT

roles.description:
Utilised Terraform for Azure cloud to deliver a highly scalable solution for National Pharmacies, deployed in one click.
Maintained cloud infrastructure ensuring best security practices by leveraging Prisma vulnerability scanning.
Developed Azure PowerShell scripts to assist in automation for Azure resources.
Integrated the client onto the cloud, seamlessly transitioning their data away from on premises.
Developed and deployed changes in C# APIs and MSSQL databases.

Led UI/UX Design in Figma for SAHealth adhering to client requirements, resulting in end-user centric interfaces.
Developed an Angular front end to deliver a user-friendly experience and integrated it with a MSSQL and C# backend.
Assisted with the development of MSSQL and C# API integration.

title: UI/UX Designer · Internship at DXC Technology

roles.description:
Designed front-end elements for an employee management portal.
Worked on full-stack development in Angular, Spring MVC, and Neo4j
to create, deploy, and test the product.
Designed and developed the product as a POC in React Native and Google Firebase
